non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning him or her or similarly significantly affects him or her.
non_compliant.amend: Provide transparency on the use of automated decision-making, including profiling, for matching purposes. Offer users the right to object to such processing or request human intervention, particularly when it significantly affects them.
